price: 45. Dus beschermde Allah hem tegen het kwaad dat zij geplot hadden, en een kwade bestraffing het volk van Farao omringde.
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُواْۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhu al-lahu sayyiāti mā makarū waḥāqa biāli fir'ʿawna sūu al-ʿadhābi
